# Roblox The Forge Calculator

> Free Roblox Forge Calculator for The Forge game. An all-in-one tool designed to help players optimize ore combinations, trait setups, and weapon/armor crafting with real-time calculations.

The Forge Calculator eliminates manual calculations for ore combinations and modifier multipliers. Whether you're a beginner learning the forging system or an experienced player seeking optimal builds, our tool provides instant results for all your crafting needs in The Forge Roblox game.
